What happened to the narrator during their sleep?
The narrator had a restless night with vivid images and a sense of foreboding.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What triggered the narrator's sense of foreboding?
The previous day's trek through the forest.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happened to the narrator when they woke up?
The narrator felt exhausted and didn't feel like they slept at all.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the effect of the narrator's sleepless state?
The narrator suffered one penalty die on any CON rolls throughout the next day.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What caused the narrator to lose a CON roll?
Their sleepless state.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the result of the narrator's CON roll penalties?
They suffered a penalty die on any CON rolls.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long did the narrator have to suffer from the CON roll penalties?
Until they slept again.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happened to the narrator's CON rolls after they slept again?
The text does not specify, but implies that they would regain their CON rolls.
